profile.biography: I am a product manager by trade and have spent most of time building and growing cloud services. I am a problem solver who likes to challenge assumptions and design innovating solutions. I am currently a lead Product Manager at Amazon Web Services focusing on NoSQL database services such as Amazon DocumentDB. I am originally from India and moved to the United States in 2011 to study at University of California, UCLA. I enjoy all things data and open source.

educations.title: University of California, Los Angeles
educations.description: Coursework focused on Computer Science fundamentals such as algorithms, operating systems, and networking. Took specific electives in Databases, Mobile Developement, and Artificial Inteligence

careers.title: Amazon Web Services
careers.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the worldâ€™s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 200 fully featured services from data centers globally. I currently work as a lead product manager on Amazon DocumentDB, AWS's scalable, highly durable, and fully managed database service for operating mission-critical MongoDB workloads. My day to day invovles building and designing capabilities customers are asking for, planning the roadmap, working with go-to-market partners, and handling key customer relationships.

careers.title: Microsoft
careers.description: Microsoft Azure, is Microsoft's public cloud computing platform. It provides a range of cloud services, including compute, analytics, storage and networking. I spent 5 years at Microsoft Azure as a product manager, launching several database services such as Azure PostgreSQL, Azure Arc databases, and Azure Synapse Analytics. I also focused on enabling developers to connect and build applications with traditional Microsoft database such as SQL Server using the langauges such as Node.js and Python on Linux and macOS.

interests.title: Sports
interests.description: I couldn't live without sports. I love watching cricket, basketball, tennis, football, american football and UFC

interests.title: Board games
interests.description: I live in Seattle, so board games make for a perfect activity in the winters. Catan, Camel Up, and Splendor are some of my favs

interests.title: Biking
interests.description: I love riding my bike around town. I have two bikes - one road bike and a Vanmoof electric bike. Highly recommend Vanmoof btw

interests.title: Travel
interests.description: Beyond the day to day stuff, I spend most of my money on travelling. I've visited 22 countries and visited all continents except South America and Antractica, although I should be able to knock one of them out soon
